title: ICE / KIM RACISM FINAL TALK
description: You failed the red check to get Kim to dance, and now you have to try to make amends or lose Kim's friendship forever.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "It's colder outside than you were e..."
dialogueTree.text: It's colder outside than you were expecting. You see the lieutenant, standing there, a small cloud of white escaping from his mouth...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He turns to you, but says nothing."
links.text: He turns to you, but says nothing.

links.title: Empathy: "He's waiting to see what you do. Fo..."
links.text: He's waiting to see what you do. For god's sake say you fucked up, please.

links.title: Volition: "First the investigation, now this....."
links.text: First the investigation, now this... how many more things do you have to fuck up?

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Sharp pain shoots through your hip,..."
links.text: Sharp pain shoots through your hip, throbbing...

links.title: You: ""Hey, Kim.""
links.text: "Hey, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective," he says, his voice lev..."
links.text: "Detective," he says, his voice level as a tabletop.

links.title: Composure: "There won't be any preamble chit-ch..."
links.text: There won't be any preamble chit-chat this time. Get to the point.

links.title: You: ""What's your problem?""
links.text: "What's your problem?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's *my* problem?" he says, his..."
links.text: "What's *my* problem?" he says, his voice rising with indignation...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're a real piece of work, detec..."
links.text: "You're a real piece of work, detective, you know that?"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He is your half-brother and you're..."
links.text: He is your half-brother and you're driving him away. For what?

links.title: You: ""What do you want me to do?""
links.text: "What do you want me to do?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Apologizing* would be a good star..."
links.text: "*Apologizing* would be a good start."

links.title: You: ""I don't see why you're getting all..."
links.text: "I don't see why you're getting all bent out of shape over a *word*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "Maybe it rea..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "Maybe it really *isn't* your fault. You might just be an irretrievable human catastrophe..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which I guess makes *me* the idiot..."
links.text: "Which I guess makes *me* the idiot for hoping you could be better... I mean, *look* at yourself..."

links.title: Volition: "Yes, look at yourself. What do you..."
links.text: Yes, look at yourself. What do you see?

links.title: You: "'Irretrievable human catastrophe' s..."
links.text: 'Irretrievable human catastrophe' sounds about right.

links.title: Volition: "So that's it? You don't even *want*..."
links.text: So that's it? You don't even *want* to change?

links.title: You: "A good guy, underneath it all."
links.text: A good guy, underneath it all.

links.title: Volition: "If that good guy never comes out, w..."
links.text: If that good guy never comes out, what difference does it make?

links.title: You: "A goddamn superstar, that's what."
links.text: A goddamn superstar, that's what.

links.title: Volition: "Kind of hard to sing a duet when yo..."
links.text: Kind of hard to sing a duet when you're all alone on-stage, isn't it, superstar?

links.title: You: "The harbinger of doom."
links.text: The harbinger of doom.

links.title: Volition: "The only doom you've brought about..."
links.text: The only doom you've brought about so far is your own.

links.title: You: "Just a sorry stack of shit..."
links.text: Just a sorry stack of shit...

links.title: Volition: "Yeah, didn't even know they stack s..."
links.text: Yeah, didn't even know they stack shit *that* sorry.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I just don't understand. We had be..."
links.text: "I just don't understand. We had been making *real* progress toward solving the case..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But now I'm afraid I just can't tr..."
links.text: "But now I'm afraid I just can't trust you."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I know you're mad, but I act..."
links.text: "Okay, I know you're mad, but I actually just talked to the spirit of Revachol and she told me we need to work together..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you with a..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you with a mix of pity, contempt, and alarm...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Get your shit together, detective.""
links.text: "Get your shit together, detective."

links.title: You: ""But Kim, the spirit...""
links.text: "But Kim, the spirit..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, enough. I don't want to..."
links.text: "Detective, enough. I don't want to hear about your degenerate ravings. I've heard *plenty* as it is. Just stop."

links.title: You: ""I'm working on it, I just need you..."
links.text: "I'm working on it, I just need your help..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""God, *no*. I'm a detective, not a..."
links.text: "God, *no*. I'm a detective, not a charity service for shambolic degenerates who won't help themselves..."

links.title: You: ""Kim, I can explain...""
links.text: "Kim, I can explain..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stop, STOP. You won't even call me..."
links.text: "Stop, STOP. You won't even call me by my *actual title*. It's always, 'Kim this, Kim that.' Has it even occurred to you how disrespectful that is?"

links.title: You: ""But what about all the good times..."
links.text: "But what about all the good times we had together?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*What* good times?""
links.text: "*What* good times?"

links.title: You: ""It was just words, Kim. They don't..."
links.text: "It was just words, Kim. They don't mean anything."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If they don't mean anything, why d..."
links.text: "If they don't mean anything, why do you say them?"

links.title: You: ""I can do better.""
links.text: "I can do better."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But, see, you *can't*, or you just..."
links.text: "But, see, you *can't*, or you just refuse to, not that the difference really matters."

links.title: You: ""So... what now?" (Proceed.)"
links.text: "So... what now?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant goes silent for a mo..."
links.text: The lieutenant goes silent for a moment.

links.title: Composure: "He has the upright bearing of a kin..."
links.text: He has the upright bearing of a king's headsman, waiting to carry out the crown's sentence.

links.title: Empathy: "He's been anticipating this moment..."
links.text: He's been anticipating this moment for some time. Still, it doesn't make it any easier for him to say...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For the sake of the investigation...."
links.text: "For the sake of the investigation... I'll stay."

links.title: Inland Empire: "You hear that? The lieutenant's sta..."
links.text: You hear that? The lieutenant's staying! Brotherhood conquers all!

links.title: You: ""So, you're giving me another shot?""
links.text: "So, you're giving me another shot?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, you fucking asshole. This isn'..."
links.text: "No, you fucking asshole. This isn't a *game* and you're not the *hero*. You don't *get* infinite chances to do the right thing. That's not how the world works..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm staying because *I* have to pr..."
links.text: "I'm staying because *I* have to protect the investigation *from you*..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now -- if it were any other day, I..."
links.text: "Now -- if it were any other day, I would excuse myself for the night. But we have more pressing matters. We need to get to the island -- and we need to do it as soon as possible."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This case," he turns to face the s..."
links.text: "This case," he turns to face the sea, "is much, *much* bigger than just you or me. We're close to the end -- let's cross the finish line. Then we can part our ways."

links.title: Shivers: "The dark shadow of the church is dr..."
links.text: The dark shadow of the church is drawn out on the sand... two men stand there, silent. Their talk is over.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now -- if it were any other day, I..."
links.text: "Now -- if it were any other day, I would excuse myself for the night. But we have more pressing matters. We need to wrap up this investigation and we need to do it *fast*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, if you'll excuse me, I have s..."
links.text: "Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some other matters to attend to. We'll meet again as usual in the morning. And detective..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't fuck anything else up while..."
links.text: "Don't fuck anything else up while I'm away."

links.title: Authority: "The sentence has been passed."
links.text: The sentence has been passed.

links.title: Shivers: "The dark shadow of the church is dr..."
links.text: The dark shadow of the church is drawn out on the sand... two men stand there, silent. Their talk is over.

links.title: You: ""That's great, I could still use yo..."
links.text: "That's great, I could still use your assistance."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You fucking asshole. I'm not here..."
links.text: "You fucking asshole. I'm not here to be your *loyal assistant*, and I never have been..."

links.title: You: ""Why? I don't really need you anywa..."
links.text: "Why? I don't really need you anyway."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course that's what you think, c..."
links.text: "Of course that's what you think, contrary to all evidence and experience. I'm not here for your sake..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've been spinning your wheels h..."
links.text: "You've been spinning your wheels here for *how* long? And what do you have to show for it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, I'm done waiting for you to..."
links.text: "Well, I'm done waiting for you to get your shit together."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've not just been *unhelpful* w..."
links.text: "You've not just been *unhelpful* when it comes to solving the case, you've been an active *hindrance* to the investigation..."

links.title: You: ""Okay, you're right. I fucked up ba..."
links.text: "Okay, you're right. I fucked up back there."

links.title: You: ""I think I fucked up back there...""
links.text: "I think I fucked up back there..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You *think*?""
links.text: "You *think*?"

links.title: You: ""Hey, I made a mistake, but it's no..."
links.text: "Hey, I made a mistake, but it's not all my fault, you know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? It's not your *fault* that..."
links.text: "Really? It's not your *fault* that you're *down with racism* or whatever you told that lorryman?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "You definitely could have handled t..."
links.text: You definitely could have handled that better.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not your *fault* that you sub..."
links.text: "It's not your *fault* that you subscribed to Measurehead's inane racial theories?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Those theories didn't really hold u..."
links.text: Those theories didn't really hold up in retrospect, did they?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not your *fault* that you buy..."
links.text: "It's not your *fault* that you buy into whatever conspiracies bug-chasing cryptofascists feed you?"

links.title: Logic: "He's right. No one *forced* you to..."
links.text: He's right. No one *forced* you to believe that nonsense.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You know, detective, one of your p..."
links.text: "You know, detective, one of your problems is that *nothing* ever seems to be your fault. Have you noticed that?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, scratch that. I *definitely*..."
links.text: "Okay, scratch that. I *definitely* fucked up."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, and?""
links.text: "Yes, and?"

links.title: You: ""'And'?""
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant stares impassively."
links.text: The lieutenant stares impassively.

links.title: Shivers: "MAKE IT RIGHT. MORE THAN YOU KNOW D..."
links.text: MAKE IT RIGHT. MORE THAN YOU KNOW DEPENDS ON IT.

links.title: You: ""...and I'm sorry.""
links.text: "...and I'm sorry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let me ask you something..." He le..."
links.text: "Let me ask you something..." He leans in to inspect you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What do you see when you look at m..."
links.text: "What do you see when you look at me?"

links.title: You: ""A true *Vacholiere*.""
links.text: "A true *Vacholiere*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant appears caught off-g..."
links.text: The lieutenant appears caught off-guard by your response. He takes a moment to collect himself...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nobody's ever said that to me befo..."
links.text: "Nobody's ever said that to me before..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't suppose anyone ever questi..."
links.text: "I don't suppose anyone ever questions whether you belong here. Whatever your faults, you're a solid detective. You're *obviously* Revacholian..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was born here. I grew up here. I..."
links.text: "I was born here. I grew up here. It's the only *home* I've ever known. And there's a good chance I'll die in the line of duty here, too."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But -- to most of my countrymen, I..."
links.text: "But -- to most of my countrymen, I will always be some *monkey fucker*."

links.title: You: ""Wait, before I blacked out, I *tal..."
links.text: "Wait, before I blacked out, I *talked* to *La Revacholière*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You... what?""
links.text: "You... what?"

links.title: You: ""I spoke with the spirit of Revacho..."
links.text: "I spoke with the spirit of Revachol. Or, I guess, she spoke to *me*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Suppose I *don't* recommend you be..."
links.text: "Suppose I *don't* recommend you be involuntarily committed for a moment... what did *La Revacholière* say to you?"

links.title: Empathy: "Hold on a moment. Maybe now's not t..."
links.text: Hold on a moment. Maybe now's not the best time to tell the lieutenant that the world is ending...

links.title: You: ""Uh... she said the RCM is gonna ha..."
links.text: "Uh... she said the RCM is gonna have an important role to play..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A role to play in *what*?""
links.text: "A role to play in *what*?"

links.title: You: ""The... future?""
links.text: "The... future?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What kind of *future* are we talki..."
links.text: "What kind of *future* are we talking about here?"

links.title: You: ""You know... like stuff that hasn't..."
links.text: "You know... like stuff that hasn't happened yet."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Quit fooling around, detective." T..."
links.text: "Quit fooling around, detective." There's real urgency in the lieutenant's voice now. "What did La Revacholière tell you about the future?"

links.title: You: ""She said the world is ending in 22..."
links.text: "She said the world is ending in 22 years."

links.title: You: ""The end of the world.""
links.text: "The end of the world."

links.title: You: ""The end of the world.""
links.text: "The end of the world."

links.title: You: ""She said the world is going to end..."
links.text: "She said the world is going to end in 22 years."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The world... is going to end..." T..."
links.text: "The world... is going to end..." The lieutenant considers this for a long moment...

links.title: Empathy: "The lieutenant is a rational observ..."
links.text: The lieutenant is a rational observer of reality. His worldview can't accommodate this kind of thing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Promise me something, detective: Y..."
links.text: "Promise me something, detective: You won't tell anyone else what you just told me."

links.title: You: ""But Kim, I'm the Augur of Desolati..."
links.text: "But Kim, I'm the Augur of Desolation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, I'm serious. Have you c..."
links.text: "Detective, I'm serious. Have you considered what will happen to the RCM's reputation if one of our own starts going around talking about the end of the world? In an official capacity?"

links.title: You: ""Are you sure? It seems kinda impor..."
links.text: "Are you sure? It seems kinda important."

links.title: You: ""That's probably wise.""
links.text: "That's probably wise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, I... think I need to take car..."
links.text: "Now, I... think I need to take care of some personal matters for a while. If you don't object, I'm going to leave the rest of the day's investigation to you..."

links.title: You: ""Go ahead.""
links.text: "Go ahead."

links.title: You: ""Wait, I wasn't done...""
links.text: "Wait, I wasn't done..."

links.title: You: ""She said it was important that we..."
links.text: "She said it was important that we stick together, as partners."

links.title: You: ""Never mind, I was just talking cra..."
links.text: "Never mind, I was just talking crazy talk."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see..." the lieutenant says, tap..."
links.text: "I see..." the lieutenant says, tapping his foot...

links.title: You: ""To me, you're my partner.""
links.text: "To me, you're my partner."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "For a moment the lieutenant seems t..."
links.text: For a moment the lieutenant seems to be suppressing something uncomfortable. Then he clears his throat...

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant's not comfortable wi..."
links.text: The lieutenant's not comfortable with emotional openness. He's eager to change the subject.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now -- if it were any other day, I..."
links.text: "Now -- if it were any other day, I would leave for the night. But we have more pressing matters. We need to get to the island -- and we need to do it as soon as possible."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This case," he turns to face the s..."
links.text: "This case," he turns to face the sea, "is much, *much* bigger than just you and me. We're close -- let's keep it professional until the very end."

links.title: Shivers: "The dark shadow of the church is dr..."
links.text: The dark shadow of the church is drawn out on the sand... two men stand there. In silence.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now -- if it were any other day, I..."
links.text: "Now -- if it were any other day, I would leave for the night. But we have more pressing matters. We need to wrap up this investigation and we need to do it *fast*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, good, because we *are* partn..."
links.text: "Well, good, because we *are* partners. Now, I have some personal matters I'd like to get in order. If you don't object, I'm going to leave the rest of the day's investigation to you..."

links.title: You: ""Go ahead.""
links.text: "Go ahead."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Try not to break anything while I'..."
links.text: "Try not to break anything while I'm gone. I'll see you in the morning, detective."

links.title: Shivers: "The dark shadow of the church is dr..."
links.text: The dark shadow of the church is drawn out on the sand... two men part there. In silence.

links.title: You: ""Wait, I wasn't done...""
links.text: "Wait, I wasn't done..."

links.title: You: ""That really sucks, man.""
links.text: "That really sucks, man."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it *does*." The lieutenant be..."
links.text: "Yes, it *does*." The lieutenant begins tapping his foot...

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant's not comfortable ta..."
links.text: The lieutenant's not comfortable talking about himself so openly. He's eager to change the subject.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In any case, I have some personal..."
links.text: "In any case, I have some personal matters I'd like to get in order. If you don't object, I'm going to leave the rest of the day's investigation to you..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't suppose anyone ever questi..."
links.text: "I don't suppose anyone ever questions whether you belong here. Whatever your faults, you're a decent-enough detective. No one will ever *doubt* that you're a real Revacholian..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't suppose anyone ever questi..."
links.text: "I don't suppose anyone ever questions whether you belong here. No matter how badly you fuck up, no matter what a mess you make, you never *stop* being Revacholian..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... no offence.""
links.text: "... no offence."

links.title: You: ""None taken.""
links.text: "None taken."

links.title: You: ""I mean, you're not wrong.""
links.text: "I mean, you're not wrong."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""My half-brother.""
links.text: "My half-brother."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's what you're *supposed* to s..."
links.text: "That's what you're *supposed* to say, of course... But do you know what you *didn't* say?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Revacholian.""
links.text: "Revacholian."

links.title: You: ""A Seolite.""
links.text: "A Seolite."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, at least you're explicit abo..."
links.text: "Well, at least you're explicit about it. Most of the time people try to be *polite*." The lieutenant doesn't even flinch. "You know what you did *not* say I am, though?"

links.title: You: ""Just a... guy.""
links.text: "Just a... guy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah, that's what most people *say..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's what most people *say*. But do you know what they *don't* say?"

links.title: You: ""A binoclard.""
links.text: "A binoclard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Be serious a moment, please...""
links.text: "Be serious a moment, please..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""People call me all sorts of things..."
links.text: "People call me all sorts of things. But you know the one thing they *never* call me?"

links.title: You: ""A pinball wizard.""
links.text: "A pinball wizard."

links.title: You: ""I'm not apologizing, if that's wha..."
links.text: "I'm not apologizing, if that's what you're waiting for."

links.title: Rhetoric: "What are you, a petulant child? He..."
links.text: What are you, a petulant child? He expects you to apologize.
